item.title: Nikephoros
item.description: Nikephoros is a high ranking member in the Noswaith society and is one of few Ymarferydd on the isle of The Forlorn Shiver.

item.title: Primevil Speakers
item.description: The Primevil Speakers are a group of 5 elders who function as the leadership of the Brethyn Noswaith upon The Forlorn Shiver.

item.title: Therapydd
item.description: Therapydd was one of Myrrdin Chosaach’s life long friends from a young age. Myrrdin and Therapydd (His friend that disappeared 3 years ago on his A’lawdrinaieth) were close friends for all though their childhood.

item.title: Ymarferydd
item.description: The Ymarferydd make up a select few members of the Brethyn Noswaith who can speak directly to the Eidolons of The Forlorn Shiver.
